author: David Brennan
title: U.K. Says Millions of Coronavirus Test Kits Bought From China Are Unreliable for Most Patients
description: It was hoped that the finger-prick blood tests could identify who had developed an immunity to the virus, allowing them out of lockdown.
content:
The British government will seek refunds for millions of coronavirus test kits purchased from China, after a study of the products found them to be unreliable for use with most patients.
Professor John Bell, coordinator of coronavirus testing for Public Heal… [+2575 chars]
